text: Jisas takaw olap agak, Pen binɨb ogɨnap, kɨli ñɨsɨkol paysɨkol olap yɨp gos lɨnɨgup ak nop gel apyap pakɨnɨgab ak, tɨmel yɨbɨl gɨnɨgabal agak. Kɨlop kab awl yɨbɨl okok kuŋam ak nag lɨ tɨbɨkɨl, dam ñɨg solwala ak yokel ñɨg ñɨbɨl kubɨkep ak, kɨlop gɨtep gɨpɨlap agak. Taynen? Binɨb ogɨnap koŋɨm mɨdɨl ñɨsɨkol paysɨkol olap nop gɨ tɨmel gɨnɨgabal ak, kɨdek yul awl yɨbɨl dɨnɨgabal agak.
